_source.text: "Abba Amoun of Nitria came to see Abba Anthony and said to him, 'Since my rule is stricter than yours how is it that your name is better known amongst men than mine is?' Abba Anthony answered, 'It is because I love God more than you.'"

text: yours how is it that your name is **better** **known** amongst men than mine is?' Abba **Anthony** answered, 'It is **because** I **love** God more than you.'"
